attributes.action: Stop Islam taking over the UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Government is again giving in to the Muslims by giving benefits to their illegal second wives. It is time the Government told these people that if they want to live here they abide by our laws or they will be deported. This goes for faith schools, Mosques, preachers of hate and terrorism, forced marriages and so called honour killings.

reasons: Potentially libellous, false, or defamatory statements
